fields.name: Administer
fields.description: Manage an organization, handle paperwork, analyze records, and keep an institution functioning on a daily basis.

fields.name: Connect
fields.description: Find people who can be helpful and get them to cooperate with you.

fields.name: Drive
fields.description: Drive vehicles, sail ships, fly planes, pilot drones, and perform basic repairs.

fields.name: Exert
fields.description: Apply physical strength and stamina to feats like running, jumping, or climbing.

fields.name: Fix
fields.description: Create and repair devices both simple and complex.

fields.name: Heal
fields.description: Provide medical or psychological treatment for injuries or illnesses.

fields.name: Know
fields.description: Recall facts about academic or scientific topics and history.

fields.name: Lead
fields.description: Inspire and convince others to follow you.

fields.name: Notice
fields.description: Spot details and anomalies in your environment.

fields.name: Perform
fields.description: Showcase performance skills such as singing, dancing, or acting.

fields.name: Program
fields.description: Operate or hack computers and communications equipment.

fields.name: Punch
fields.description: Used in unarmed combat; without training, the modifier is -1.

fields.name: Shoot
fields.description: Used for ranged weapon attacks.

fields.name: Sneak
fields.description: Move silently and remain unseen.

fields.name: Stab
fields.description: Used for melee attacks with bladed weapons.

fields.name: Survive
fields.description: Use street smarts or wilderness skills to stay alive.

fields.name: Talk
fields.description: Persuade, charm, or deceive others through conversation.

fields.name: Trade
fields.description: Negotiate, buy, or sell goods and services.

fields.name: Work
fields.description: Apply your skills in a specific profession or trade.

fields.name: Cast
fields.description: Cast spells (for magic-enabled campaigns).

fields.name: Summon
fields.description: Summon spirits or supernatural allies (for magic-enabled campaigns).
